subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With catcher Jorge Posada out of the lineup Tuesday night resting a strained right calf, Yankees Manager Joe Girardi had good reason to embrace Posada’s backup, Francisco Cervelli.
snippet: With catcher Jorge Posada out of the lineup Tuesday night resting a strained right calf, Yankees Manager Joe Girardi had good reason to embrace Posada’s backup, Francisco Cervelli.
